segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to have a trip to Sydney .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . How long is your vacation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , how do you like this one ? You will stay there for 17 days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's good . By the way , what kind of clothes do I have to bring with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's summer in Sydney so you have to bring your summer wear .
segments.speaker: S1
